titles.title: Condemning the statements of Representative Pramila Jayapal of Washington.
Condemning the statements of Representative Pramila Jayapal of Washington.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns certain statements by Representative Pramila Jayapal regarding Israel and the Palestinians, reaffirms the commitment of the House of Representatives to the state of Israel, supports Israel's right of self-defense, and condemns anti-Semitic hate speech.
